snippet: Support for an early end date reflected uneasiness among Fed officials about the effectiveness of asset purchases in stimulating the economy.
abstract: Federal Reserve officials are debating how soon to stop campaign to reduce unemployment, only months after announcing effort; support for early end date reflects uneasiness among Fed officials about effectiveness of asset purchases in stimulating the economy.
lead_paragraph: Support for an early end date reflected uneasiness among Fed officials about the effectiveness of asset purchases in stimulating the economy.

headline.seo: At Meeting, Debate Over Length of Fed Program
headline.main: In Last Meeting, Fed Officials Debated Length of Program to Stimulate Job Market
headline.print_headline: In Last Meeting, Fed Officials Debated Length of Program to Stimulate Job Market
